CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 4, 1950, pg. 29 reads: "Heidt And Runner-Up - Irving Barnes, right, is shown with Horace Heidt, noted bandleader and talent show impresario, after Mr. Barnes won second prize in contest at the Gardens in Pittsburgh Sunday night. The air show is sponsored by Philip Morris cigarettes.  Mr. Barnes is a native of Western Pennsylvania. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Bandleader Horace Heidt shaking hands with second prize winner Irving Barnes, posed in The Gardens during contest
